name: HallowTomb
description:
-Story-

Welcome to a world filled with humans and humanoids of all races. In this world there are Areas and a secret book called MEK. MEK is a book that hold energy and magic. In our story we have Humanoid Rabbit(or Bunny) name Blxxd and his friend and crime partner Mongrel and he is more human than Dog. These 2 fine champs have been granted a second chance to do the right thing to do good. As the deeds be done they will have new party members and learn more things about who they are and what energy they possessed.

Throughout the game there will be "Acts". Maybe 5 of them you will experience. Each act you will see what is going on in this world and Area's the game will take you. Think of this as a tale that will have twist and turns like no other. So get ready for a fun and wild experience from this game.

In this game there will be: Light and Dark Comedy, Sexual themes, LGBT, Alcohol references (and drinks in the bar), Violence, Blood.

-Technical stuff if you interested-

Battle System: Alpha ABS
Playable Characters: (Still working that out)

Level System: Acts plus stages

How many Acts: 3-5 maybe (depends)
